news-1.headline: Beethhoven (Beathoven)
news-1.content: Don't mind my spelling. That doesn't mean I'm unliteratured - I'm listening to Bethoven. Hear me out. He's still alive. news-2.headline: Crow
news-2.content: Stare into darkness, my friend. This will be your brightest moment.

news-3.headline: Neverseen
news-3.content: Melancholics are the only ones accepted in our society. This is our society.

news-4.headline: Working class
news-4.content: Literally me. No one works as hard as me. 7 days per week - they said. Phew. Pathetic. What about 8 days per week.

news-5.headline: Stupid penguins
news-5.content: This article won't be about penguins at all. I just wanna make noise about how cool this is.
